Spin Hamiltonian¶

Introduction¶

The Hamiltonian is the sum of the Zeeman, zero-field, intertriplet dipole-dipole and intertriplet exchange terms.

For details, refer to this paper.

The class uses:

  • \(\hbar=1\)

  • Tesla for magnetic field strength

  • electronvolts for energies

  • radians for angles

  • ZX’Z’’ convention for Euler angles

  • the molecular system of molecule A throughout, which takes the x-axis parallel to the long molecular axis, the y-axis parallel to the short molecular axis and the z-axis perpendicular to the plane of the molecular backbone

The zero-field basis is used for the construction of the Hamiltonian:

\[\{|\phi_i\rangle\}=\{|xx\rangle, |xy\rangle, |xz\rangle, |yx\rangle, |yy\rangle, |yz\rangle, |zx\rangle, |zy\rangle, |zz\rangle\}\]

The tripletpairs.spin.SpinHamiltonian can be used to compute the total spin Hamiltonian, its eigenvectors and eigenvalues and the overlap factors \(|C_S^l|^2\) that are required for further simulations.

Example¶

from tripletpairs.spin import SpinHamiltonian
# set the parameters
sh = SpinHamiltonian()
sh.D = 5.1e-6
sh.E = 1.6e-7
sh.X = 1.1e-9
sh.J = 0
sh.rAB = (0.7636, -0.4460, 0.4669)
sh.alpha, sh.beta, sh.gamma = 0, 0, 0
sh.theta, sh.phi = 0, 0
sh.B = 0
# the individual parts of the hamiltonian must be calculated separately
sh.calculate_exchange_hamiltonian()
sh.calculate_zerofield_hamiltonian_single_molecule()
sh.calculate_zerofield_hamiltonian_molecule_A()
sh.calculate_dipoledipole_hamiltonian()
sh.calculate_zerofield_hamiltonian_molecule_B()
sh.calculate_zeeman_hamiltonian()
sh.calculate_hamiltonian()
# then the quantities of interest can be calculated
sh.calculate_eigenstates()
sh.calculate_cslsq()
# and accessed as attributes:
cslsq = sh.cslsq
eigenvalues = sh.eigenvalues
eigenstates = sh.eigenstates
# alternatively, calculate everything all at once
sh.calculate_everything()

API¶

class tripletpairs.spin.SpinHamiltonian[source]¶

A class for calculating and using the spin Hamiltonian for (T..T) states.

mu_B¶

Value of the Bohr magneton in eV. Default is 5.788e-5.

Type

float

g¶

Value of the electron g-factor. Default is 2.002.

Type

float

J¶

Value of the intertriplet exchange energy in eV.

Type

float

D, E

Values of the intratriplet zero-field splitting parameters in eV.

Type

float

X¶

Value of the intertriplet dipole-dipole coupling strength in eV.

Type

float

rAB¶

Centre-of-mass vector (x, y, z) between the two molecules comprising the triplet-pair. Must be given in the molecular coordinate system of molecule A.

Type

3-tuple of float

alpha, beta, gamma

Euler angles \(\alpha, \beta, \gamma\) that would rotate molecule A onto molecule B using the ZX’Z’’ convention, in radians. Must be calculated in the molecular coordinate system of molecule A.

Type

float

theta, phi

Spherical polar angles \(\theta, \phi\) defining the orientation of the magnetic field in the molecular coordinate system of molecule A.

Type

float

B¶

Value of the external magnetic field strength in Tesla.

Type

float

H¶

The computed Hamiltonian matrix (9x9).

Type

numpy.ndarray

eigenvalues¶

1D array containing the computed eigenvalues (the energies of the 9 (T..T) states).

Type

numpy.ndarray

eigenvectors¶

The computed eigenvectors (columns).

Type

numpy.ndarray

csl¶

1D array containing the overlap factors between the 9 eigenstates and the singlet. Complex numbers in general.

Type

numpy.ndarray

cslsq¶

1D array containing the squared overlap factors between the 9 eigenstates and the singlet. These are what is used in kinetic models.

Type

numpy.ndarray

calculate_cslsq()[source]¶

Calculate the overlaps.

Returns

Return type

None.

calculate_dipoledipole_hamiltonian()[source]¶

Calculate the zintertriplet dipole-dipole Hamiltonian.

Notes

Depends on rAB only.

Returns

Return type

None.

calculate_eigenstates()[source]¶

Calculate the eigenvalues and eigenstates.

Returns

Return type

None.

calculate_everything()[source]¶

Calculate the Hamiltonian, eigenstates, eigenvalues and overlaps all at the same time.

Returns

Return type

None.

calculate_exchange_hamiltonian()[source]¶

Calculate the exchange Hamiltonian.

Notes

Independent of any parameters.

Returns

Return type

None.

calculate_hamiltonian()[source]¶

Calculate the total spin Hamiltonian.

Notes

All the constituent parts must be calculated first.

Returns

Return type

None.

calculate_zeeman_hamiltonian()[source]¶

Calculate the Zeeman Hamiltonian.

Notes

Depends on theta and phi only.

Returns

Return type

None.

calculate_zerofield_hamiltonian_molecule_A()[source]¶

Calculate the zero-field Hamiltonian for molecule A.

Notes

Depends on D and E only.

Returns

Return type

None.

calculate_zerofield_hamiltonian_molecule_B()[source]¶

Calculate the zero-field Hamiltonian for molecule B.

Notes

Depends on alpha, beta and gamma.

Returns

Return type

None.

calculate_zerofield_hamiltonian_single_molecule()[source]¶

Calculate the zero-field Hamiltonian for a single molecule.

Notes

Depends on D and E only.

This is a precursor for calculating the zero-field Hamiltonian of molecule B.

Returns

Return type

None.
